description: Micky and Patrick were chilling the other day. Micky has been crushing on Patrick for a year now, but, Micky is pretty sure he is straight. Finally, Micky could not handle his desires any longer and decided to confront Patrick. Once he saw Patrick's bulge, he knew he could convince him to let him suck him off. A mouth is a mouth after all. Watch how a gay teen seduces his straight friend. Maybe a few tips will rub off, there will be a lot more rubbing off, regardless.
title: Mighty Penis
